title: Frontend Developer
description:
**Title:** 
 Frontend Developer (Angular)
 



**Location:** 
 Bangalore
 



  





**About DataNimbus:** 




 At DataNimbus, we are on a mission to redefine how organizations leverage Data and AI to drive growth, innovation, and efficiency. Our pioneering products, such as DataNimbus Designer (a cloud\\-native ETL designer), datanimbus.io (a comprehensive data and integration platform), FinHub.ai (payment modernization platform) empower businesses to simplify complex workflows, adopt cutting\\-edge technology, and achieve sustainable scalability.
 



  





 With headquarters in the U.S. and offices in India and Canada, DataNimbus operates globally, fostering a culture of responsible innovation, adaptability, and customer\\-centricity. We pride ourselves on being a trusted partner for customers navigating the complexities of Data\\+AI and payment modernization.
 



  





**Why Join DataNimbus?** 




 At DataNimbus, we believe in shaping a sustainable, AI\\-driven future while offering an environment that prioritizes learning, innovation, and growth. Our core values‚ÄîCustomer\\-Centricity, Simplicity, Curiosity, Responsibility, and Adaptability‚Äîare the foundation of our workplace, ensuring every team member can make a meaningful impact. Joining DataNimbus means being part of a dynamic team where you can:
 


* Work with cutting\\-edge technologies and revolutionize workflows in Data\\+AI solutions.
* Contribute to solutions that are trusted by global businesses for their scalability, security, and efficiency.
* Grow personally and professionally in a culture that values curiosity and continuous learning.



 If you're passionate about innovation, ready to solve complex challenges with simplicity, and eager to make a difference, DataNimbus is the place for you.
 



  





**Why join DataNimbus:** 




 At DataNimbus, we are committed to pushing the boundaries of what is possible in the world of payments. Our forward\\-thinking solutions pave the way for a smarter and more agile future. Collaborate with a dynamic team of experts and work on groundbreaking projects that shape the future of digital commerce. Embrace the future of payments modernization and become a catalyst for change with us.
 



 Our core values of Creative Solutioning, People First, Collaboration, and Transparency form the foundation of our vibrant and inclusive work culture. We believe in providing strong learning and growth opportunities to all our team members, making it an ideal place for anyone joining the company.
 



  





**What do we want you to do:** 




 ‚óè Develop new user\\-facing features.
 



 ‚óè Build reusable code and libraries for future use.
 



 ‚óè Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
 



 ‚óè Work closely with the product, design and engineering teams.
 



 ‚óè Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to the back\\-end.
 



 ‚óè Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability.
 



 ‚óè Stay up\\-to\\-date with new features and product launches.
 



  





**What would help make your case:** 




 ‚óè Education \\- B.Tech/BSc .
 



 ‚óè Proven 4\\+ years work experience as a Frontend Engineer.
 



 ‚óè Ability to take ownership of all the feature/module, its related activities and build processes around it with minimal hand holding.
 



 ‚óè An ability to market and promote the support services and to advocate for necessary resources, support, and appreciation for the support team.
 



 ‚óè Good understanding of DataNimbus products and services.
 



 ‚óè Must have skills \\-
 



 ‚óã Strong front\\-end UI development skills using scripting languages like HTML5, CSS3 (SASS), Bootstrap, JavaScript (Jquery, Angular 4\\+,).
 



 ‚óã Experience in Cross\\-browser\\- HTML, CSS, JavaScript coding to offer responsive web app layouts to a modern browser and mobile devices.
 



 ‚óã Knowledge in web testing tools (e.g Jasmine, Karma)
 



 ‚óã Experience with RESTful services.
 



  





 Interested?
 



 Send in your CV to
 
 careers@datanimbus.com
 
 ASAP.

title: Javascript / Typescript Developer
description:
Crolit is matching emerging JavaScript and TypeScript developers with early\\-stage startups and founders building their founding engineering teams. Instead of endless applications, you create a profile once and get matched with the right opportunities instantly.
 



  





**You might be a fit if you:** 



* Have 0‚Äì3 years of experience in JavaScript, TypeScript, or full\\-stack web development
* Are comfortable with modern web stacks (React, Next.js, Node.js, Express, NestJS, REST APIs, GraphQL, Webpack/Vite, Docker)
* Have built apps through internships, hackathons, open source, or personal projects that solve real\\-world problems
* Are comfortable working in fast\\-paced, founder\\-led teams where you‚Äôll own end\\-to\\-end features



  





**Role details:** 



* Flexible work: async and remote\\-first
* Expected commitment: 10‚Äì40 hrs/week (part\\-time or full\\-time)
* Contract duration: 1‚Äì3 months, often with extension or conversion to full\\-time
* Direct interviews with startup founders and hiring teams via Crolit



  





**Compensation:** 



* Pay ranges from $15/hr for part\\-time gigs to $15K‚Äì$30K annually for full\\-time roles



  





**About Crolit:** 




 Crolit is an AI\\-powered hiring platform that connects developers and engineers with founders and early\\-stage startups. Our mission is simple: hire smarter, faster, and fairer. We eliminate outdated processes so talent spends less time applying and more time building.
 



  





 Our early focus is on matching junior and founding engineers with startups, and we‚Äôre expanding to roles across backend, frontend, ML, data, product, and growth as companies scale.

title: Software Development Engineer
description:
**About The Role**
**Grade Level (for internal use):**
 09
   

  

 We're seeking a talented and highly motivated lead software engineer to help us develop a scalable, high\\-performance, cloud\\-based platform for large\\-scale data storage and processing. Solve interesting technical challenges in the areas of distributed high\\-performance computing for a high\\-available cloud environment.
   

  

 Candidate is hands\\-on and passionate about exploiting multiple languages and programming techniques across products, frameworks and API layers ‚Äòusing the right tool for the right job‚Äô to address sustainable solutions. Candidate is willing to explore new tools \\& technologies to meet the product demands.
   

  

 This person will work closely with existing team members to develop a comprehensive Java/J2EE based and Angular product. The role requires tight collaboration with product managers and business analysts to develop the products according to the business schedule.
   

  

 General and deep experience with Core Java concepts , J2EE technologies, Typescript and Angular are a must. Strong knowledge of relational database, AWS knowledge is must.
   

  

 This position will suit candidates who enjoy both the technical and business aspects of developing software solutions to a schedule in an environment of high visibility and transparency around deliverables, business needs, and customer value.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Develop implementation of financial services software using enterprise Java, RDBMS and modern web technologies
* Work closely with product leads to understand development requirements and translate them to code deliverables for financial applications
* Quickly understand system architecture and leverage design and development, taking ownership of assigned modules to drive projects to completion
* Independently execute Proof of Concepts to validate approach. Summarize and document results for stakeholder review
* Validate developed solutions to ensure that requirements are met and the results meet the business needs
* Establish and maintain Continuous Deployment methodologies including working with SQA teams to enforce unit and automated testing
* Develop required tools to automate management of all facets of data operations


**Required Skills**
* Experience in Core JAVA/J2EE related product development.
* Strong knowledge in web technologies and JavaScript based frameworks (Node JS, Angular, Typescript etc.) .
* Excellent knowledge of RDBMS and Postgres.
* Knowledge of Spring/Hibernate/Restful Web Services is a must.
* The right candidate would also demonstrate solid OO programming including Object Oriented Design Patterns and have strong opinions on best programming practices
* Experience on some of the cloud technologies like AWS, container orchestration platforms , ECS etc.
* Well versed with continuous integration and continuous delivery tools and techniques
* Strong proficiency applying REST\\-based API frameworks to large scale, distributed high traffic web services
* Experience in Agile SCRUM project management methodologies
* Prefer to work in a nimble and dynamic environment with strong emphasis on ownership and responsibility
* Ability and passion to pick up new technologies and stay on the leading edge of full\\-stack development


**Education And Experience**
* Masters or Bachelors in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent experience
* 3\\-7 years of professional programming experience


**Skills Appreciated**
* Experience with Capital Markets domain
* Full stack experience is a plus
* AWS Cloud experience is desirable
* Experience in Agile SCRUM project methodology


**About S\\&P Global Market Intelligence**
 At S\\&P Global Market Intelligence, a division of S\\&P Global we understand the importance of accurate, deep and insightful information. Our team of experts delivers unrivaled insights and leading data and technology solutions, partnering with customers to expand their perspective, operate with confidence, and make decisions with conviction.
   

  

 For more information, visit www.spglobal.com/marketintelligence.
   

  

**What‚Äôs In It For** 
**You?**
**Our Purpose**
 Progress is not a self\\-starter. It requires a catalyst to be set in motion. Information, imagination, people, technology‚Äìthe right combination can unlock possibility and change the world.
   

  

 Our world is in transition and getting more complex by the day. We push past expected observations and seek out new levels of understanding so that we can help companies, governments and individuals make an impact on tomorrow. At S\\&P Global we transform data into Essential Intelligence¬Æ, pinpointing risks and opening possibilities. We Accelerate Progress.
   

  

**Our People**
 We're more than 35,000 strong worldwide‚Äîso we're able to understand nuances while having a broad perspective. Our team is driven by curiosity and a shared belief that Essential Intelligence can help build a more prosperous future for us all.
   

  

 From finding new ways to measure sustainability to analyzing energy transition across the supply chain to building workflow solutions that make it easy to tap into insight and apply it. We are changing the way people see things and empowering them to make an impact on the world we live in. We‚Äôre committed to a more equitable future and to helping our customers find new, sustainable ways of doing business. We‚Äôre constantly seeking new solutions that have progress in mind. Join us and help create the critical insights that truly make a difference.
   

  

**Our Values**
**Integrity, Discovery, Partnership**
 At S\\&P Global, we focus on Powering Global Markets. Throughout our history, the world's leading organizations have relied on us for the Essential Intelligence they need to make confident decisions about the road ahead. We start with a foundation of
 **integrity** 
 in all we do, bring a spirit of
 **discovery** 
 to our work, and collaborate in close
 **partnership** 
 with each other and our customers to achieve shared goals.
   

  

**Benefits**
 We take care of you, so you can take care of business. We care about our people. That‚Äôs why we provide everything you‚Äîand your career‚Äîneed to thrive at S\\&P Global.
   

  

**Our Benefits Include**
* Health \\& Wellness: Health care coverage designed for the mind and body.
* Flexible Downtime: Generous time off helps keep you energized for your time on.
* Continuous Learning: Access a wealth of resources to grow your career and learn valuable new skills.
* Invest in Your Future: Secure your financial future through competitive pay, retirement planning, a continuing education program with a company\\-matched student loan contribution, and financial wellness programs.
* Family Friendly Perks: It‚Äôs not just about you. S\\&P Global has perks for your partners and little ones, too, with some best\\-in class benefits for families.
* Beyond the Basics: From retail discounts to referral incentive awards‚Äîsmall perks can make a big difference.


 For more information on benefits by country visit: https://spgbenefits.com/benefit\\-summaries
   

  

**Global Hiring And Opportunity At S\\&P Global**
 At S\\&P Global, we are committed to fostering a connected and engaged workplace where all individuals have access to opportunities based on their skills, experience, and contributions. Our hiring practices emphasize fairness, transparency, and merit, ensuring that we attract and retain top talent. By valuing different perspectives and promoting a culture of respect and collaboration, we drive innovation and power global markets.
   

  

**Recruitment Fraud Alert**
 If you receive an email from a spglobalind.com domain or any other regionally based domains, it is a scam and should be reported to reportfraud@spglobal.com. S\\&P Global never requires any candidate to pay money for job applications, interviews, offer letters, ‚Äúpre\\-employment training‚Äù or for equipment/delivery of equipment. Stay informed and protect yourself from recruitment fraud by reviewing our guidelines, fraudulent domains, and how to report suspicious activity here.
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 S\\&P Global is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race/ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other status protected by law. Only electronic job submissions will be considered for employment.
   

  

 If you need an accommodation during the application process due to a disability, please send an email to:‚ÄØEEO.Compliance@spglobal.com‚ÄØand your request will be forwarded to the appropriate person.
   

  

**US Candidates Only:** 
 The EEO is the Law Poster http://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/eeopost.pdf‚ÄØdescribes discrimination protections under federal law. Pay Transparency Nondiscrimination Provision \\- https://www.dol.gov/sites/dolgov/files/ofccp/pdf/pay\\-transp\\_%20English\\_formattedESQA508c.pdf
   

  

 20 \\- Professional (EEO\\-2 Job Categories\\-United States of America), IFTECH202\\.1 \\- Middle Professional Tier I (EEO Job Group), SWP Priority ‚Äì Ratings \\- (Strategic Workforce Planning)
   

  

**Job ID:** 
 318544
   

  

**Posted On:** 
 2025\\-09\\-14
   

  

**Location:** 
 Hyderabad, Telangana, India

title: Software Engineer Intern
description:
Join Our Visionary Team at Pulchritude Fashion!
 



  





 Location: Remote
 



  





 About Pulchritude Fashion:
 



 Pulchritude Fashion is an innovative startup blending fashion, film, and artificial intelligence to create virtual, cinematic fashion experiences. Our platform utilizes digital avatars and advanced video\\-generation technologies to produce immersive, ticketed virtual runway films, enabling audiences to interact with AI\\-driven models and designers.
 



  





 We Are Looking For:
 



 Creative, talented, and ambitious individuals passionate about the intersection of fashion, film, and technology. We invite you to apply if your background aligns with any of the following areas:
 



 ‚Ä¢ Fashion Design and Styling
 



 ‚Ä¢ Marketing and Social Media
 



 ‚Ä¢ Software Engineering and AI Development
 



 ‚Ä¢ Product Management and Development
 



 ‚Ä¢ Business Strategy and Operations
 



 ‚Ä¢ Customer Engagement and Experience
 



 ‚Ä¢ Film Production and Editing
 



 ‚Ä¢ Digital Content Creation and Graphic Design
 



 ‚Ä¢ Public Relations and Communications
 



 ‚Ä¢ Administrative and Operational Support
 



  





 Key Qualifications:
 



 ‚Ä¢ Relevant educational or professional experience in your field
 



 ‚Ä¢ Strong communication and collaboration skills
 



 ‚Ä¢ Creative problem\\-solving and adaptability
 



 ‚Ä¢ Passion for innovation and emerging technologies
 



  





 What We Offer:
 



 ‚Ä¢ An inclusive, diverse, and creative remote work environment
 



 ‚Ä¢ Opportunities for professional development and growth
 



 ‚Ä¢ Competitive compensation and performance\\-based incentives
 



 ‚Ä¢ A collaborative culture that fosters creativity, innovation, and excellence
 



  





 How to Apply:
 



 Submit your resume along with a brief cover letter highlighting your specific area of interest and explaining how your skills and experiences align with Pulchritude Fashion‚Äôs unique mission.
 



  





 Pulchritude Fashion is an equal opportunity employer. We actively seek diversity and encourage individuals from all backgrounds to apply, fostering an inclusive environment where everyone can thrive.

title: Cloud Engineer
description:
**üöÄ We‚Äôre Hiring: AWS DevOps Engineer** 




 üìç
 **Location:** 
 Work from Office (WFO) ‚Äì 5 days a week
 



 üïí
 **Shift:** 
 24/7 Rotational Shift
 



 üìÖ
 **Joiners Preferred:** 
 Immediate to 15 days
 



**Experience level:** 
 5\\+ years
 



  





**Role Overview:** 




 We are looking for a
 **hands\\-on Platform Engineer (AWS DevOps)** 
 with strong execution skills to design, provision, and manage scalable cloud infrastructure. The ideal candidate should bring solid expertise in
 **Terraform, AWS, Linux, and Kubernetes** 
 , along with strong troubleshooting abilities in cloud and containerized environments.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Provision AWS infrastructure using
 **Terraform (IaC)** 
 .
* Manage and troubleshoot
 **Kubernetes clusters (EKS/ECS)** 
 .
* Work with AWS core services:
 **VPC, EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, ALB, WAF, CloudFront** 
 .
* Support
 **CI/CD pipelines** 
 using Jenkins and GitHub.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to resolve infra \\& deployment issues.
* Maintain clear documentation of infrastructure and operational procedures.



  





**Required Skills:** 



* 5\\+ years of experience in AWS infrastructure provisioning with
 **Terraform** 
 .
* Strong
 **Linux administration \\& troubleshooting** 
 skills.
* Hands\\-on
 **Kubernetes cluster management** 
 experience.
* Familiarity with
 **CI/CD tools** 
 (Jenkins, GitHub).
* Good communication skills and a team\\-first attitude.



  





**Preferred Qualifications:** 



* AWS Certification (Solutions Architect, DevOps Engineer, etc.).
* Exposure to Agile and DevOps practices.
* Experience with monitoring \\& logging tools.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
**Skill: Senior DevOps Engineer** 




**Experience level: 7\\+ Years** 




**Location: Bangalore/Pune** 




**preferred immediate to 15 days joiners** 




**Mode: WFO all 5 days a week** 




  





**JD:** 




**Job Description:** 




**As a Senior DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for overseeing the end\\-to\\-end delivery of DevOps tasks, guiding junior team members, and ensuring the efficiency and reliability of our software development lifecycle (SDLC) pipelines. You will work on cutting\\-edge technologies and be instrumental in challenging the existing status quo to streamline our entire pipeline.** 




**Key Responsibilities:** 




**¬∑ Lead the design, implementation, and management of CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Kubernetes.** 




**¬∑ Develop and maintain deployment architecture, ensuring adherence to cloud best practices.** 




**¬∑ Own the end\\-to\\-end delivery of DevOps tasks, ensuring timely and efficient execution.** 




**¬∑ Mentor and guide junior team members, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.** 




**¬∑ Implement FinOps strategies to optimize cloud resource usage and cost management.** 




**¬∑ Utilize Large Language Models (LLM) for day\\-to\\-day DevOps activities to enhance productivity and efficiency.** 




**¬∑ Manage and upgrade End\\-of\\-Life (EOL) components to ensure system stability and security.** 




**¬∑ Challenge existing processes and practices, driving innovation and improvements in the DevOps pipeline.** 




**¬∑ Oversee Git branch management and ensure best practices are followed.** 




**¬∑ Ensure infrastructure security and resiliency, implementing robust security measures.** 




**¬∑ Set up and manage Kafka and Elasticsearch clusters, ensuring their resiliency and performance.** 




**¬∑ Utilize Helm for Kubernetes package management and deployment.** 




**¬∑ Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to ensure seamless integration and delivery of software solutions.** 




**¬∑ Perform production releases, ensuring smooth and high\\-quality delivery from development to production.** 




**¬∑ Design, deploy, and manage cloud\\-based infrastructure and applications, leveraging cloud services.** 




**¬∑ Work with monitoring and observability tools like Grafana, Dynatrace, Splunk, DataDog, etc., to ensure system performance and reliability.** 




**Qualifications:** 




**¬∑ Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.** 




**¬∑ Over 7 years of experience in DevOps, with a strong focus on Jenkins, Kubernetes, and SDLC pipelines.** 




**¬∑ Proven experience in deployment architecture and cloud best practices.** 




**¬∑ Strong leadership skills with the ability to guide and mentor junior team members.** 




**¬∑ Experience in FinOps and optimizing cloud resource usage.** 




**¬∑ Familiarity with using LLM for DevOps activities.** 




**¬∑ Experience with managing EOL components and driving process improvements.** 




**¬∑ Proficient in Git branch management and infrastructure security.** 




**¬∑ Knowledge of setting up and managing Kafka and Elasticsearch, including their resiliency.** 




**¬∑ Experience with Helm for Kubernetes package management.** 




**¬∑ Experience with monitoring and observability tools like Grafana, Dynatrace, Splunk, DataDog, etc.** 




**¬∑ Excellent problem\\-solving skills and the ability to challenge the status quo.** 




**Preferred Skills:** 




**¬∑ Experience in financial services or a related industry.**

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
**About The Role**
**Grade Level (for internal use):**
 09
   

  

**The Team**
 The iLEVEL team is part of the Enterprise Solutions Division, comprising over 100 engineers across the USA, Europe, and India. Our team is passionate about technology and solving complex technical challenges, with a strong focus on quality and high performance. We value collaboration and innovation, working with cloud\\-native technologies and modern development practices to deliver high\\-quality solutions to our global customers.
   

  

**Responsibilities And Impact**
* Develop front and back\\-end components using .NET and React.
* Participate in storyboarding, user flow mapping, and low\\-fidelity prototyping.
* Apply design thinking in sprint planning and user\\-centric delivery.
* Use GitHub Copilot, Cursor, or Claude to accelerate development.
* Collaborate in Agile ceremonies and Vibe Coding sessions.
* Experiment with LLM\\-based APIs and basic AI features.


**What We‚Äôre Looking For**
**Basic Required Qualifications:**
* 3‚Äì5 years of experience in full stack development.
* Exposure to agile methodologies, CI/CD, and Git workflows.
* Hands\\-on experience with Copilot, Claude, or similar tools.
* Eagerness to learn design thinking and user\\-centered development.


**Additional Preferred Qualifications**
* Curiosity and interest in AI, LLMs, and modern development practices.
* Experience with cloud\\-native technologies, particularly AWS.
* Familiarity with responsive front\\-end frameworks like React and Angular.
* Understanding of microservices architecture and high\\-capacity data processing.


**About S\\&P Global Market Intelligence**
 At S\\&P Global Market Intelligence, a division of S\\&P Global we understand the importance of accurate, deep and insightful information. Our team of experts delivers unrivaled insights and leading data and technology solutions, partnering with customers to expand their perspective, operate with confidence, and make decisions with conviction.
   

  

 For more information, visit www.spglobal.com/marketintelligence.
   

  

**What‚Äôs In It For** 
**You?**
**Our Purpose**
 Progress is not a self\\-starter. It requires a catalyst to be set in motion. Information, imagination, people, technology‚Äìthe right combination can unlock possibility and change the world.
   

  

 Our world is in transition and getting more complex by the day. We push past expected observations and seek out new levels of understanding so that we can help companies, governments and individuals make an impact on tomorrow. At S\\&P Global we transform data into Essential Intelligence¬Æ, pinpointing risks and opening possibilities. We Accelerate Progress.
   

  

**Our People**
 We're more than 35,000 strong worldwide‚Äîso we're able to understand nuances while having a broad perspective. Our team is driven by curiosity and a shared belief that Essential Intelligence can help build a more prosperous future for us all.
   

  

 From finding new ways to measure sustainability to analyzing energy transition across the supply chain to building workflow solutions that make it easy to tap into insight and apply it. We are changing the way people see things and empowering them to make an impact on the world we live in. We‚Äôre committed to a more equitable future and to helping our customers find new, sustainable ways of doing business. We‚Äôre constantly seeking new solutions that have progress in mind. Join us and help create the critical insights that truly make a difference.
   

  

**Our Values**
**Integrity, Discovery, Partnership**
 At S\\&P Global, we focus on Powering Global Markets. Throughout our history, the world's leading organizations have relied on us for the Essential Intelligence they need to make confident decisions about the road ahead. We start with a foundation of
 **integrity** 
 in all we do, bring a spirit of
 **discovery** 
 to our work, and collaborate in close
 **partnership** 
 with each other and our customers to achieve shared goals.
   

  

**Benefits**
 We take care of you, so you can take care of business. We care about our people. That‚Äôs why we provide everything you‚Äîand your career‚Äîneed to thrive at S\\&P Global.
   

  

**Our Benefits Include**
* Health \\& Wellness: Health care coverage designed for the mind and body.
* Flexible Downtime: Generous time off helps keep you energized for your time on.
* Continuous Learning: Access a wealth of resources to grow your career and learn valuable new skills.
* Invest in Your Future: Secure your financial future through competitive pay, retirement planning, a continuing education program with a company\\-matched student loan contribution, and financial wellness programs.
* Family Friendly Perks: It‚Äôs not just about you. S\\&P Global has perks for your partners and little ones, too, with some best\\-in class benefits for families.
* Beyond the Basics: From retail discounts to referral incentive awards‚Äîsmall perks can make a big difference.


 For more information on benefits by country visit: https://spgbenefits.com/benefit\\-summaries
   

  

**Global Hiring And Opportunity At S\\&P Global**
 At S\\&P Global, we are committed to fostering a connected and engaged workplace where all individuals have access to opportunities based on their skills, experience, and contributions. Our hiring practices emphasize fairness, transparency, and merit, ensuring that we attract and retain top talent. By valuing different perspectives and promoting a culture of respect and collaboration, we drive innovation and power global markets.
   

  

**Recruitment Fraud Alert**
 If you receive an email from a spglobalind.com domain or any other regionally based domains, it is a scam and should be reported to reportfraud@spglobal.com. S\\&P Global never requires any candidate to pay money for job applications, interviews, offer letters, ‚Äúpre\\-employment training‚Äù or for equipment/delivery of equipment. Stay informed and protect yourself from recruitment fraud by reviewing our guidelines, fraudulent domains, and how to report suspicious activity here.
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 S\\&P Global is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race/ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other status protected by law. Only electronic job submissions will be considered for employment.

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
Title: QA Engineer (Automation)
 



 Location: Bangalore, India
 



  





**About DataNimbus:** 




 At DataNimbus, we are on a mission to redefine how organizations leverage Data and AI to drive growth, innovation, and efficiency. Our pioneering products, such as DataNimbus Designer (a cloud\\-native ETL designer), datanimbus.io (a comprehensive data and integration platform), FinHub.ai (payment modernization platform) empower businesses to simplify complex workflows, adopt cutting\\-edge technology, and achieve sustainable scalability.
 



 With headquarters in the U.S. and offices in India and Canada, DataNimbus operates globally, fostering a culture of responsible innovation, adaptability, and customer\\-centricity. We pride ourselves on being a trusted partner for customers navigating the complexities of Data\\+AI and payment modernization.
 



  





**Why Join DataNimbus?** 




 At DataNimbus, we believe in shaping a sustainable, AI\\-driven future while offering an environment that prioritizes learning, innovation, and growth. Our core values‚ÄîCustomer\\-Centricity, Simplicity, Curiosity, Responsibility, and Adaptability‚Äîare the foundation of our workplace, ensuring every team member can make a meaningful impact. Joining DataNimbus means being part of a dynamic team where you can:
 


* Work with cutting\\-edge technologies and revolutionize workflows in Data\\+AI solutions.
* Contribute to solutions that are trusted by global businesses for their scalability, security, and efficiency.
* Grow personally and professionally in a culture that values curiosity and continuous learning.
* If you're passionate about innovation, ready to solve complex challenges with simplicity, and eager to make a difference, DataNimbus is the place for you.



  





**What would you be doing:** 



* Responsible for estimation, design, development and maintenance of functional and regression test automation scripts.

* Develop automation test strategy and approach.
* Work with the product team to discuss and troubleshoot issues/queries.
* Mentor fellow team members.



  





**What would help make your case:** 



* Education \\- B.Tech or equivalent bachelor's degree; Good to possess ISTQB Certification.

* Must have skills \\-
* Need strong Selenium/Protractor/UI Path/Equal UI skills
* Need experience with playwright, postman, restassured, CICD, javascript/typescript.
* Experience in creation of automation testing strategy and automation design documents.
* Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies.

* Ability to work both independently and in a collaborative environment.
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
* Prefer if you have \\-
* Banking domain knowledge.
* Manual testing knowledge.
* API Testing knowledge.



  





 Interested?
 



 Send in your CV to
 
 careers@appveen.com
 
 ASAP.

title: Senior Formal Verification Engineer
description:
**Senior Formal Verification Engineer** 




**Bangalore, INDIA** 




**Break through the data movement barrier** 




**We are a data\\-driven, software\\-defined, unified fabric boosts performance and scalability for SoCs and chiplets.** 




**Location: Bangalore, India** 




**We are seeking an experienced Formal Verification specialist to join the DV team in Bengaluru. This position is full onsite in the Whitefield office. Overall, we are looking for at least 6/7 years of industry experience.** 




  





**Develop detailed formal verification (FV) test plans based on design specifications and collaborate with design teams to refine micro\\-architecture specifications.** 




  





**Identify key logic components and critical micro\\-architectural properties essential for ensuring design correctness.** 




  





**Implement formal verification models, abstractions, assertions, and utilize assertion\\-based model checking to detect corner\\-case bugs.** 




  





**Apply complexity reduction techniques using industry\\-standard EDA tools or academic formal verification tools to achieve proof convergence or sufficient depth.** 




  





**Develop and maintain scripts to enhance FV productivity and streamline verification processes.** 




**Assist design teams with the implementation of assertions and formal verification testbenches for RTL at unit/block levels.** 




  





**Participate in design reviews and collaborate with design teams to optimize design quality and performance, power, area (PPA) metrics based on formal analysis feedback.** 




  





**Strong proficiency in System Verilog/Verilog.** 




  





**Good scripting abilities with Python or Perl.** 




  





**Preferred Experience:** 




  





**Hands\\-on experience with formal verification tools such as Synopsys VCFormal and Cadence JasperGold.** 




**Experience with both bug hunting and static proof verification techniques.** 




**Familiarity with automating formal verification workflows within a CI/CD environment.**

**Uday** 




**Mulya Technologies** 




**muday\\_bhaskar@yahoo.com**

We are looking for energetic and dedicated individuals share our passion for enabling innovation and excellence in the semiconductor industry that empowers game\\-changing products and services!**

title: AI Engineer (FoodTech) (MUMBAI LOCATION)
description:
**Company: LabelBlind¬Æ** 




**Role: AI Engineer** 




**Full\\-Time Role. Mumbai, India.** 




**IMMEDIATE joining** 




  





 LabelBlind is India‚Äôs 1st digital food labelling company. As a B2B SaaS startup focused on revolutionizing food labeling through innovative software solutions, our mission is to empower food businesses with tools that ensure compliance, accuracy, and efficiency in food labeling. Our suite of software solutions is designed for the food industry, targeting Food Export Companies, Domestic Packed Food Businesses, Food D2C and Ecommerce Companies, Hotels, QSRs, Catering companies, and International Food Companies (primarily in the GCC). Leveraging technologies like React with Redux, Node.js, MongoDB, AWS, computer vision, and large language models (LLMs), we are building smart, user\\-centric solutions.
 



  





 The company is based out of Mumbai, seeking Mumbai based candidates only.
 



  





**Job Description:** 




 We are seeking an experienced and talented AI Engineer to join our dynamic team at a fast\\-growing Food Tech Startup based in Mumbai. As an AI Engineer, you will play a crucial role in developing and deploying innovative AI solutions that enhance our food\\-related services. Your expertise in OCR, computer vision, neural networks, object detection models, NLP, and generative AI will be instrumental in driving our company's success.
 



  





 Role reporting to the VP \\- Engineering.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 



1. Develop and implement OCR (Optical Character Recognition) systems to extract relevant information from food\\-related documents.
2. Design and train object detection models using state\\-of\\-the\\-art techniques to recognize and categorize food items under relevant data sets.
3. Utilize Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques to extract insights from text data to improve our understanding of food products and enhance our services.
4. Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams, including software engineers to integrate AI algorithms and models into our existing applications and platforms.
5. Continuously evaluate and improve the performance of existing AI models by conducting rigorous testing, troubleshooting, and implementing enhancements.
6. Participate in code reviews, provide constructive feedback, and maintain high\\-quality code standards to ensure the reliability, scalability, and maintainability of our AI systems.
7. Document your work, including algorithm designs, methodologies, and experiments, to facilitate knowledge sharing and support future development efforts.



  





**Requirements:** 



1. Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
2. Minimum 3 years of practical experience working with OCR, object detection models, NLP, and generative AI in a professional setting.
3. Proficiency in programming languages such as Python and experience with Django frameworks and libraries, including TensorFlow, PyTorch, OpenCV, and NLTK.
4. Experience with ChatGPT prompts to modify data input and output.
5. Solid understanding of machine learning algorithms, deep learning architectures, and statistical modeling techniques.
6. Proven track record of delivering high\\-quality AI solutions within deadlines.



  





 Knowledge of cloud platforms, such as AWS or Google Cloud, and experience with deploying AI models in production environments is a plus.
 



  





**Important :** 



* **Serious candidate with proven credentials and relevant experience only.**
* **Candidates with references will be preferred**
* **Past experience in AI is a MUST.**

title: Engineer / Sr. Engineer - RTOS M/F For Bangalore (H/F) - SAFRAN ELECTRONICS & DEFENSE SERVICES INDIA
description:
Safran est un groupe international de haute technologie op√©rant dans les domaines de l'a√©ronautique (propulsion, √©quipements et int√©rieurs), de l'espace et de la d√©fense. Sa mission : contribuer durablement √† un monde plus s√ªr, o√π le transport a√©rien devient toujours plus respectueux de l'environnement, plus confortable et plus accessible. Implant√© sur tous les continents, le Groupe emploie 100 000 collaborateurs pour un chiffre d'affaires de 27,3 milliards d'euros en 2024, et occupe, seul ou en partenariat, des positions de premier plan mondial ou europ√©en sur ses march√©s. Safran est la 2√®me entreprise du secteur a√©ronautique et d√©fense du classement ¬´ World's Best Companies 2024 ¬ª du magazine TIME. Safran Electronics \\& Defense propose √† ses clients des solutions d'intelligence embarqu√©e leur permettant d'appr√©hender l'environnement, de r√©duire la charge mentale et de garantir une trajectoire, m√™me en situation critique, ce dans tous les environnements : sur terre, en mer, dans le ciel ou l'espace. La soci√©t√© met les expertises de ses 13 000 collaborateurs au service de ces trois fonctions : observer, d√©cider et guider, pour les march√©s civils et militaires.
   

  

 Descriptif mission
   

  

 The Software RTOS Engineer, will be responsible for the development of a software assigned perimeter in a strong team of engineers working on hi\\-tech embedded applicative software. You will be part of Software Engineering Department which has multidisciplinary teams across multiple Safran sites working together to provide innovative, future products of high technological value in aeronautical, land and maritime industries. You will work in close collaboration with the Reseach\\&Development headquarters of Safran Electronics and Defense in France. In the short term, you will join a task force dedicated to Low Level Testing. You will have the responsibility of your assigned perimeter of Low Level Testing activities, as a Team member. In this context you will be reporting directly to the Technical Manager and operationally to the Tech Lead. Working with others, you shall responsible for: \\- ensuring the highest level of quality for your deliverables; \\- respecting deadlines provided to you by the Tech Lead; \\- handling the development of your software assigned perimeter by working with other technical stake holders (from MBD, Hardware and/or Product engineering); \\- raising awareness on technical and deadline risks related to your deliverables; \\- assessing your progress and presenting it to the Tech Lead, offering options when requested.
   

  

 Bachelor's / Master's Degree in Electronics / Computers Science Engineering with minimum of 5 years' experience in aerospace industry (of which at least 3 are in an RTOS engineering role); Experience in working in team sizes of 10 and above; You know how to develop embedded software in a low\\-level environment tailored to the aeronautical industry with DO\\-178C; Experience in the processes of software projects in fields constrained by aeronautical standards, or close. You are able to quickly understand technical challenges, including in fields of which you are not an expert of, and are likely to offer solution steps throughout their resolution. Self\\-reliant, you illustrate yourself as a good communicator, dynamic, rigorous, organized, and show an ease in building professional relationships through teamwork. Must have proven experience with: \\- Low Level Testing/Low Level Requirements (like with RTRT/IBM RATIONAL TEST REALTIME STUDIO); \\- Low\\-level software development/architecture (RTOS/Boot/Driver/Dataloader, compilation toolchain, debug tools); \\- Assembly \\& C proficiency. Nice to have experience with: \\- DO\\-178C; \\- Knowledge of RTOS concepts, Real\\-time Services, Communication constraints, CPU \\& memory; \\- Knowledge of embedded networks: CAN, A429, A664, RS4xx, Discrete, PWM, ADC, VDT, Internal mechanisms (DMA, Interruptions); \\- Configuration \\& Change Management.
